reason: 2. The speaker agrees with the proposal to reduce methane emissions by launching an educational campaign to encourage people to reduce their meat and dairy consumption. They agree with this because it would introduce methane standards to large facilities and corporations, and because it would discourage people from consuming meat by making it more expensive.
